name.ja: <ruby>ＵＲ<rt>ウルトラ</rt></ruby>アシスタント・アーチ

requirement.en: You have 10 or more cards in your Deck during the turn you Normal Summoned this card.

effect.en: Draw 1 card. Then, if you have "Ember the Super Assistant" in your Graveyard, send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, you can add to your hand 1 FIRE Attribute monster from among the cards sent. You cannot activate the effects of monsters whose original Level is 5 until the end of this turn.
